description: Google might be getting into the game of making chips.
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

Today Bloomberg News is reporting that tech giant Google might be getting into the game of making chips. Not the kind that would go into your phone or personal computer, but the kind that help power the Google servers that store tons of our data. If the rumors are true, this could be a big a threat to the world's largest chip maker, Intel. Brian Womak reported the story for Bloomberg, and tells Marketplace Tech why.

","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: Today Bloomberg News is reporting that tech giant Google might be getting into the game of making chips. Not the kind that would go into your phone or personal computer, but the kind that help power the Google servers that store tons of our data. If the rumors are true, this could be a big a threat to the world's largest chip maker, Intel. Brian Womak reported the story for Bloomberg, and tells Marketplace Tech why.
teaser: Google might be getting into the game of making chips.
title: Google may be after Intel's turf
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 13, 2013
